page.title: 16TOURISM
page.content: Given the proximity of the sea and the beautiful N.Devon coastal scenery, it is natural that tourism should play an important role in the economy. In the higher parts of Westward Ho! there are three hotels and numerous bed and breakfast establishments. Also there are two holiday camps, one consisting mainly of chalet, and the other offering static caravans and accommodation for touring caravans. Further west is a complex of holiday cottages on a farm and provision for tents and caravans. Throughout the area it is possible to find bed and breakfast accommodation and there is a popular public house in Abbotsham.
